website_summaries.verdict: A primer that does it all for dry skin and gives skin a healthy glow.
pros: Provides oil-free moisture for dry skin
Leaves skin smooth and helps minimize pores and fine lines
Has a slight shimmer to produce a healthy glow
Can be used alone as a daily moisturizer
cons: Not ideal for those looking for a matte finish

customer_reviews.title: It makes my face feel silky soft, as I’m GONE!!!!  And makes I feel like I actually look GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This crime is amazing! I do not like wearing foundation AT ALL!!! But I tried this. Description said it was tinted but not heavy. Could be worn alone or with a foundation. THIS IS ALL I NEED! It has totally transformed my face. The first picture was taken 2 years ago and the second 2 weeks ago. I look 20 years younger in the 2nd picture, per my husband and every friend that has seen me, since I started using it. By the way: I am 62 years old!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but will clog your pores
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, but you'll need to exfoliate regularly or get facials to keep your skin clear.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia (Ginny) Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great for a subtle glow
customer_reviews.text: I can put some of this on with a little sheer lip color and a swipe of mascara and I'm good to go on a Saturday around town. I use it as a base for my foundation as well. It makes your skin glow, and at almost 50, that's a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Angie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling & looking primer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this primer as a base for my makeup for the last week plus and I’m so happy with the results I get from it! It goes on so nicely! I was worried at first that it’s slightly tinted (especially as a super pale redhead), but there’s no color once it’s on! It’s thick, but not sticky and it smells great! Doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin and my makeup glides on top & looks nice and dewy, but not oily! Love it! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pati

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Makes my skin soft and easily mixes with foundation. I have sensitive skin so have to be careful with what I use. I also tend to have dry skin-especially in winter. I have used this product for over a year, all year long, and will continue to do so. I am in my 50’s and live in the Midwest.
customer_reviews.author: Sues27

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a sample in the Allure beauty box. I loved it so much I immediately ordered. It is relatively expensive compared to drug store products . However it only uses a small dot to cover the face, so the tube will last along time. I use it everyday under makeup to condition my skin and tone down wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: CRose

customer_reviews.title: You need this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this and I loved it so much I had to buy it. This is by far the best moisturizer I have ever used! I'm 55 and I've tried many. It is light, spreads easily, leaves your skin feeling and looking great and gives your skin a nice glow. It appears to have a slight tint to it but when you put it on there is no color change to your skin. It's a primer too but I use it alone. I tend to have oily skin and my skin has been less oily! I feel like I found the holy grail of moisturizers!
customer_reviews.author: DaisyD

customer_reviews.title: Love this primer!
customer_reviews.text: As I have gotten older my skin has become very sensitive. This primer helps to provide the perfect base for my foundation. It moisturizes and gives my skin a good base for applying foundation. It doesn’t feel heavy or greasy at all. I won’t put on my foundation without it. This primer helps you to smooth the foundation over your face, helps it to last throughout the day and night too.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria G.

customer_reviews.title: Best bb cream for neautral skin tone
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this to a foundation, when ipsy senr it - i did in fact ditch foundation & just replaced 3 steps in "getting ready"!! Light formula - lotiond and heavy creams cause me to sweat, this doesnt and looks great with a translucent powder. Im subscribed every 3 months for a new 1.7 oz tube, using it 6 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: BrowsingAddict

customer_reviews.title: Does it all
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I’m a make up junkie and this is my new favorite. It moisturizes and primes all at once and the slight illuminating glow under foundation is great.
customer_reviews.author: Just My Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Softens skin! Not irritating!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product every day for a few months and still have around half of the bottle left! It is one of the only moisturizers out there that actually doesn’t irritate my skin. It is super moisturizing and makes my skin really soft. It’s great to use before putting on foundation. I’m hoping to find a night product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BREAKOUTS
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it but every time I use it I break out horribly!
customer_reviews.author: maiden

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the way it smooths my face without the weight of a foundation. It has a bit of a shimmer but nothing Twilight like. Smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: elshea

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes this primer a lot! Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Bakunin

customer_reviews.title: Great moisterizer!
customer_reviews.text: I subscribe to the IPSY monthly bag, and a sample of this was inside. I fell in love with it and will always have on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this primer and moisturizer combination. I have very sensitive skin, so I need a product that is compatible and this one really fits the bill. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: wendy sutter

customer_reviews.title: Love this face cream!
customer_reviews.text: Great brand and does all it says it will. Great brand and product!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Slack

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same formula I bought from Sephora a few months ago, it doesn't have to same smell or the same immediate hydrating feeling. Maybe it's bc it's the bday edition? Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Lazy Girl Approved
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the lazy girl. I can moisturize and prime my face in one step. Love the scent!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!! This moisturizer is great to quench dry skin and add a really nice and natural looking glow. I can get away with no make up with this. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Nuse

customer_reviews.title: I thought was the same product I used before
customer_reviews.text: Once I opened it had a funny smell. I have this before and it never smelled like this. It supposed to have a coconut smell to it. But I will throw it away, because I'm not putting some funky smell on my face after I paid that amount for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Malika

customer_reviews.title: Soft, effective, smells like coconut cream! Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer and primer duo. I received a sample of this once and that's all it took. It's soft and creamy and works really well under makeup. Anytime you can find it for under $30 it's a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca West

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for a moisturizer primer combo. Just allow time for it to absorb before putting on make up
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Very light coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. it's very sheer and light, but I can still get away with this and powder alone.
customer_reviews.author: kel689

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample and couldn't believe what a difference it made. So I bought this size!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best illuminating and pore minimizing product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product! It is so sheer and gives you an instant glow. This is all I slap on in the am before hitting the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Combination Skin
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. It’s the perfect moisturizer and also the perfect primer. Very refreshing and a perfect first layer to your makeup. It leaves a dewy look without becoming oily! Recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Karbowiak

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was something I had tried before and loved. I was mistaken. This is very sheer and did not provide the priming properties that I had hoped for. I will read the labels more carefully next time.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It makes my skin look so smooth and camouflages the little flaws. No greasy feeling at all!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Burns

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizing but even tho I like it I think it’s very expensive
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer. It’s the perfect level of moisturizing and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gensel

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend product . Will definitely buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Tammi bishop

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It doesn’t dry out my face at all, and it has a slight iridescent hue to it that is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smooth, clean feel of this primer. I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get absorbed into the skin
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get absorbed into the skin. It made my skin glitter which is really weird. I am not sure how it got good reviews. I used Ultra Repair Cream Intense repair of First Aid Beauty and I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best primer, moisturizer on the planet!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this product been all my life!? My sister introduced this primer for my August wedding. It was 98 degrees in the shade and my makeup DID NOT RUN!!! It is light and very moisturizing. It goes on smooth and my skin is so soft! It also absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy sheen. I wear it under my makeup or just as a day moisturizer. I am 57 years old and certainly don't look it thanks to this awesome product! I will certainly order again and strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I love how this smells
customer_reviews.text: I love how this smells. It makes my makeup go on really smooth. I have very oily skin which can be acne prone no matter what I use. This doesn't break me out like other moisturizer do.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin & Brenda Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Best Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite moisturizer that I've found! I have super sensitive skin that can also get overly oily or overly dried out really easily. This perfectly moisturizes my skin without making it oily or breakout. It also smells AMAZING, which actually worried me at first because I assumed it had fragrance in it, but I was pleasantly surprised to find that it doesn't. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Terra Tsuji

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with skin issues pretty much all my life. I have a combo of rosacea and dermatitis. I have been using this product for about a month and my skin is happy with it. This is very rare. The product moisturizes well. The tint fades once you apply it to the skin. It smells delicious and it gives you a nice beachy glow. However, I do think that this product is overpriced and I wish it came with SPF.
customer_reviews.author: cobaltblue

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin happy!
customer_reviews.text: I rally like the feel of this product on my skin. It is cool and creamy. I apply my face serum first, then under eye cream. Then I put on this wonderful Coconut Skin Primer. It has a very faint touch of glowing color if you want to go “ natural”, or you can build on that with other makeup products. FAB makes natural and healthy for skin products that my skin loves!
customer_reviews.author: jansooz

customer_reviews.title: Sheer and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Always searching for something to make my makeup sit better, especially when I’m only doing my face for Zoom calls. This product smells great and goes on sheerly and smoothly. I have sensitive skin and haven’t used another “primer” that I like. I’ve only used this one a couple of times but I’m a fan and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Eeds

customer_reviews.title: Great in replacement for foundation
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Very hydrating and looks wonderful on my skin tone. I have purchased several and will continue to do so as it is a product that makes the face look clean shiny and no need to put any extra product. I love it and will continue to use and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JODI BURTON

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic primer for mature complexion
customer_reviews.text: This primer adds just enough sheen and hydration to perk up mature skin. The hydration keeps foundation from settling in creases and wrinkles which is fantastic! I will absolutely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug1

customer_reviews.title: Good product, even if it were more expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all over primer. It leaves a nice glow to my face and my makeup stays on with this primer. i use it all over, and my eyeshadow stays on too.
customer_reviews.author: Tara from NY

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is great by itself or under my foundation. Such a great base! Not greasy. Stays put and evens out your skin. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Brock

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten a sample of this product and fell in love with it. A wee bit pricey for the size but a little does go a long way and the finish has just a hint of shimmer which gives a nice overall glow. It is now a part of my daily routine ;)
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: ... product in an allure red box delivery and absolutely loved it. It makes my skin dewey and luminous
customer_reviews.text: I sampled this product in an allure red box delivery and absolutely loved it. It makes my skin dewey and luminous. Makeup stays on longer and is more vibrant. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: TFrye

customer_reviews.title: sheen to it which is a nice brightener. Works well as primer
customer_reviews.text: Has a sort of pink, sheen to it which is a nice brightener. Works well as primer.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample from my Alure Box. I have sensitive skin that breaks out with 98% of moisturizers. This doesn't. It even helps me from breaking out when I DO wear foundation. Love the texture and the scent. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlynn H

customer_reviews.title: This is the best stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stuff!! My face feels soft and helps my makeup go on much easier. Don’t have to use as much makeup, either. I love this brand!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Guinn

customer_reviews.title: Nice Primer
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer, doubles as a primer plus natural look moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baird

customer_reviews.title: This moisturize is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am 52 years old. Normal skin. I received this product as a sample first from another supplier .Excellent product. It keep my face moisturized. Then I decided to continue use it. Now is one of my most everyday facial products . I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: rosie Bo

customer_reviews.title: makes skin smooth for the foundation
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice primer!!! smooth and not greasy... highlights your skin and my bare minerals powder goes on great...
customer_reviews.author: clara the dental hygienist

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent primer that feels great and stays nice all day. It smells good, too!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This makes your face feel so smooth and it smells really heavenly! I ordered another tube after I tried it the first time, I didn't want to run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon reader

customer_reviews.title: Might as well be a moisturizer. Not a primer at all
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. I was looking for a primer. This was like putting on a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: gabby leo

customer_reviews.title: Love the moisture
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Really gives me a smooth moisturizer for makeup base.
customer_reviews.author: Plant lady

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, the base and coconut, it’s amaxing my face is brilliant, revival
customer_reviews.author: maria neves

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: Great texture. Makes your skin glow. I love this product, especially when I’m not wearing makeup
customer_reviews.author: elisa whitney

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it feels on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it feels on my skin. I'm 41 years old and it gives me a lovely glow. My skin is combination but I haven't had any issues with break outs. I use it as a moisturizer under my primer. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: margarita  torres

customer_reviews.title: Priced Right and It Works
customer_reviews.text: Most bang for your buck. Primer is light-weight but effective and will not bust your budget. Organic and animal-friendly too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Barilich

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this !!! It does a great job makes me look younger!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

product_meta.title: First Aid Beauty Hello FAB Coconut Skin Smoothie Priming Moisturizer, 2-in-1 Moisturizer and Makeup Primer – 1.7 Oz
feature_bullets: Makeup Meets Skincare: This hydrating moisturizer packs a double punch as a makeup-gripping primer; get dewy, healthy-looking skin when worn alone and long-lasting makeup when used as a prep step
Amplify Your Natural Radiance: Micro-pearls provide light-reflecting properties that leave you with beautifully luminous skin while helping to blur pores and imperfections
Superfood Powerhouse: Coconut Water, Quinoa Protein and a blend of minerals help this non-comedogenic moisturizer repair, revitalize, hydrate and strengthen the skin barrier

Free From: Alcohol, artificial colorants, artificial fragrance, lanolin, mineral oil, parabens, petrolatum, phthalates, propylene glycol, sulfates, talc, formaldehydes, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclocarban, ethanol, ethyl alcohol, denatured alcohol
Dermatologist Tested: Our cruelty-free and vegan priming moisturizer is also safe for sensitive skin, non-comedogenic, nut-free, soy-free, oil-free, nano-free and safety in use tested

specifications.Manufacturer: Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics
